name: Groovy B and the Great Cownundrum
name_original: Groovy B and the Great Cownundrum
description:
Adventure! Mystery! Romance! Milk!

Join protagonist Groovy B, in their time-cursed Groundhog-Day-esque adventure to cure the town's government and dairy industry of cow-rruption!

Controls:

Enter = Start
Z = Interact
x = Jump
Arrow keys = Move
